detail_desc: Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Glittery Alice band with two padded hearts. The hearts are decorated with reversible sequins.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated waist and flounces at the sides. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastening at the side, and a seam above the hem. Lined.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit in jersey and trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on jersey bow tie, sewn-on waistcoat with decorative buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam with ties at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, seams on the legs and zipped side pockets with taped details. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.
Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with a seam at the waist and short puff sleeves with close-fitting cuffs.
Rhinestone-decorated metal earrings. The zinc in the metal is recycled.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a zip down the front and hood with embroidery and appliqués. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and hems, and a detachable tail at the back.
Tube scarf in thermal fleece. Length 19 cm at the back and 28 cm at the front.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with wide, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a smocked bodice with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish and fringe trims along the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Calf-length lace dress with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped edge. Partly lined.

Shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and short legs. Unlined.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Soft jersey vest top in a relaxed fit with a rib trim around the neckline and deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Block-striped swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a lined fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Sleeveless dress woven in an airy cotton blend with embroidery and fringing. Two flounces at the top, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a layer of tulle for added width. Lined.
Low-necked vest top in soft linen jersey.
Pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Top with press-studs at the top and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Wide-fitting dress in a patterned viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and a seam at the back with buttons at the top. Unlined.
Ankle boots with straps and metal buckles, wrapover sides and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Wide, ribbed cold shoulder top in a soft viscose blend with short raglan sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top, press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y). Seam with belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective details and elasticated cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Off-the-shoulder, V-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidered text, dropped shoulders and striped ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and leggings in cotton jersey. Top in a slightly longer style with dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves, discreet front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The ribbing at the hem is slightly shorter at the front and has two slits. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Low-cut neckline and slits in the sides.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in stretch jersey with wide elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif on the front, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a straight-cut hem with rows of fringing and long slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated trim at the top. Wide, embroidered flounce at the top with a scalloped edge. Elasticated hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an unlined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud (sizes 7-10Y with a normal button).

Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front, zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Lined.

Ankle-length joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a draped neckline at the front and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets, and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Folded seams and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Clamdiggers in airy washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and shaping seams at the knees.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a welt back pocket. Printed side stripes and ribbed hems.

Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, welt pockets in the side seams and short slits at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Thin jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
